creator: levinson@intersystems.com
text:
Created attachment 28263
fo file that shows problem

I attach a .fo file and the generated PDF which when used with fop 1.0 would I think produce solid borders.  Instead the borders have corners chopped off.  It looks like a “bite” is taken out of the corners.  I don’t see this problem with RenderX XEP.

I attach the files that show the problem.

creator: pascal.sancho@takoma.fr
text:
